page.title: 12CLUBS
page.content: There are no clubs as such in Camber. The Memorial Hall is the centre forsuch activities as whist drives darts,youth club indoor skittles, a florishing pre-school play group and a Good Companions Club for senior citizens. Apart from the play group, which is currently booming, the other activities do not attract a great number of people.The hall was adapted from a fire station as the original hall was demolished during the 1939/45 war,and the present Committee think that the reason for the lack of interest in activities is that it is not suitable for today's needs. In view of this the committee are making great efforts to raise money to build a new community and sports hall,in. Johnsons Field.
